Question.Subject: How do I put mine and his picture together and see what our baby will look like?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Well, I tried this site: http://www.makemebabies.com/
It worked out okay, I didn't need to sign up or anything and it produced a good result quickly. Here's a sample result from two images I plucked from Google by typing "man headshot" and "woman headshot". http://www.makemebabies.com/viewbaby.php?server_id=3&folder_id=1003238&image_name=wb20100322095856urftja36bv3a3s1iffaruffs16.jpg&baby_name=&o=s

Answer.Content:
